WhatsGlow is a powerful Chrome extension tailored to enhance your privacy and improve your experience while using WhatsApp Web. Whether you're working in a shared space or simply want to keep your chats secure, this extension provides the perfect solution.

Key Features:
Blur Sensitive Elements: Automatically blur profile pictures, contact names, messages, and other sensitive information. Hover to reveal content when needed.
Hide Specific Content: Remove outgoing and incoming messages, profile pictures, or other elements for a distraction-free experience.
Customizable Options: Choose exactly what to blur or hide—profile pictures, chats, names, or last messages.
Real-Time Updates: Automatically applies changes to new chats and messages as they load.
Privacy-First Design: No data is stored or shared—your chats and preferences remain private.
This extension is ideal for:

Privacy-Conscious Users: Keep your WhatsApp Web content hidden while working in public or shared spaces.
Focused Professionals: Eliminate unnecessary distractions to improve productivity.
Anyone Sharing Screens: Ensure sensitive chats and details stay private during presentations or screen sharing.
